summary: An ambitious priest seduces a nun and leads the Vatican into shady business during and after World War II.
cast: Christopher Reeve|Geneviève Bujold|Fernando Rey|Jason Miller|Joe Cortese|Adolfo Celi|Leonardo Cimino|Tomas Milian|Robert Prosky|Joe Pantoliano|Milena Vukotic|Ian Danby|Gregory Snegoff|Harrison Muller|David Mills|Joe Spinell|Ritza Brown|Loredana Grappasonni|Ettore Mattia|Carolyn De Fonseca|Yanti Somer|Mimmo Poli|Elio Bonadonna|Giovanni Bonadonna|Remo De Angelis|Pamela Prati|Anny Papa|Stefania D'Amario|Michele Messina|Agnès Nobecourt|Tracy Bonbrest|Paolo Maria Scalondro|Franco Angrisano|Tom Felleghy|Alfonso Giganti|Paul Muller|Amedeo Salamon|Franca Scagnetti
title: Monseñor
